index.title: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Technical Book
index.description: Welcome to the comprehensive educational resource for students, early-career engineers, and developers transitioning from digital AI to physical robotics.

modules/ai-robot-brain/isaac-setup.title: Isaac Setup
modules/ai-robot-brain/isaac-setup.description: This page covers the setup and configuration of NVIDIA Isaac Sim for the AI-Robot Brain module.

modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab1-isaac-s.title: Lab 1 - Isaac Setup
modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab1-isaac-s.description: This lab covers setting up NVIDIA Isaac Sim for the AI-Robot Brain module.

modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab2-synthet.title: Lab 2 - Synthetic Data
modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab2-synthet.description: This lab covers generating synthetic data using Isaac Sim for perception training.

modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab3-vslam.title: Lab 3 - VSLAM
modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab3-vslam.description: This lab covers implementing Visual SLAM in the Isaac Sim environment.

modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab4-nav2-pl.title: Lab 4 - Nav2 Planner
modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab4-nav2-pl.description: This lab covers implementing navigation planning with Nav2 for the humanoid robot.

modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab5-sim-to-.title: Lab 5 - Sim-to-Real
modules/ai-robot-brain/labs/lab5-sim-to-.description: This lab covers bridging simulation and real-world robotics applications.

modules/ai-robot-brain/navigation-stack.title: Navigation Stack
modules/ai-robot-brain/navigation-stack.description: This page covers the implementation of the navigation stack for the humanoid robot using Nav2.

modules/ai-robot-brain/perception-pipeli.title: Perception Pipeline
modules/ai-robot-brain/perception-pipeli.description: This page covers the implementation of the perception pipeline using NVIDIA Isaac Sim.

modules/ai-robot-brain/references.title: References
modules/ai-robot-brain/references.description: This page contains references and citations for the AI-Robot Brain module.

modules/ai-robot-brain/vslam-implementat.title: VSLAM Implementation
modules/ai-robot-brain/vslam-implementat.description: This page covers the Visual Simultaneous Localization and Mapping implementation in Isaac Sim.

modules/digital-twin/labs/lab2-sensor-co.title: Lab 2 - Sensor Configuration
modules/digital-twin/labs/lab2-sensor-co.description: This lab covers configuring simulated sensors in the digital twin environment.

modules/digital-twin/labs/lab3-ros2-sync.title: Lab 3 - ROS 2 Synchronization
modules/digital-twin/labs/lab3-ros2-sync.description: This lab covers synchronizing the digital twin with ROS 2 systems.

modules/digital-twin/labs/lab4-unity-vis.title: Lab 4 - Unity Visualization
modules/digital-twin/labs/lab4-unity-vis.description: This lab covers Unity visualization of the digital twin environment.

modules/ros2-nervous-system/labs/lab2-co.title: Lab 2 - Communication
modules/ros2-nervous-system/labs/lab2-co.description: This lab covers ROS 2 communication patterns including topics, services, and actions.

modules/ros2-nervous-system/labs/lab3-ur.title: Lab 3 - URDF Humanoid
modules/ros2-nervous-system/labs/lab3-ur.description: This lab covers creating a URDF model for the humanoid robot.

modules/ros2-nervous-system/labs/lab4-ai.title: Lab 4 - AI Agent
modules/ros2-nervous-system/labs/lab4-ai.description: This lab covers integrating AI agents with the ROS 2 robotic nervous system.

modules/ros2-nervous-system/references.title: Module 1 References: ROS 2 Robotic Nervous System

modules/vla-system/action-planning.title: Action Planning
modules/vla-system/action-planning.description: This page covers the implementation of cognitive action planning in the VLA system.

modules/vla-system/asr-integration.title: ASR Integration
modules/vla-system/asr-integration.description: This page covers the integration of Automatic Speech Recognition systems in the VLA system.

modules/vla-system/labs/lab1-asr-setup.title: Lab 1 - ASR Setup
modules/vla-system/labs/lab1-asr-setup.description: This lab covers setting up Automatic Speech Recognition for the VLA system.

modules/vla-system/labs/lab2-llm-integra.title: Lab 2 - LLM Integration
modules/vla-system/labs/lab2-llm-integra.description: This lab covers integrating Large Language Models with the ROS 2 system.

modules/vla-system/labs/lab3-action-exec.title: Lab 3 - Action Execution
modules/vla-system/labs/lab3-action-exec.description: This lab covers executing actions based on language understanding in the VLA system.

modules/vla-system/labs/lab4-vision-inte.title: Lab 4 - Vision Integration
modules/vla-system/labs/lab4-vision-inte.description: This lab covers integrating vision systems with language and action planning.

modules/vla-system/labs/lab5-vla-integra.title: Lab 5 - VLA Integration
modules/vla-system/labs/lab5-vla-integra.description: This lab covers full integration of Vision-Language-Action systems.

modules/vla-system/llm-ros-bridge.title: LLM-ROS Bridge
modules/vla-system/llm-ros-bridge.description: This page covers the integration between Large Language Models and ROS 2 for action planning.

modules/vla-system/multimodal-perception.title: Multimodal Perception
modules/vla-system/multimodal-perception.description: This page covers the integration of vision, language, and action perception systems.

modules/vla-system/references.title: References
modules/vla-system/references.description: This page contains references and citations for the Vision-Language-Action system module.

quickstart.title: Quickstart Guide: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Technical Book

reference/citations.title: Citations and References
reference/citations.description: This page contains all the verified citations used throughout the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Technical Book, organized by module and type. The book maintains strict technical accuracy standards with a minimum of 25 verified sources, with at least 40% from academic or peer-reviewed sources.

reference/glossary.title: Glossary of Robotics and AI Terms
reference/glossary.description: This glossary provides definitions for key terms used throughout the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Technical Book.
